Player History
Drafted in 21st round, 335th overall pick, by Atlanta in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/8/2015, off Carlos Rivero (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/12/2015, off Rickey Rubio (COL)...
Injured on 8/7/2015 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Released by Atlanta on 4/21/2016...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 5/21/2016 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by Philadelphia on 6/6/2016.
